Default_: ^Ciao! Did you need anything from me or my cafe?
DanniRiccobono_: ^Oh, you are Lucca's neice, right? The Riccobono name is well known here.
DanniRiccobono0GiovanniRiccobono_: ^I haven't ever met Giovanni but I know about the bakery, Giovanni was sort of a celebrity. I didn't know he had a granddaughter.
DanniRiccobono0LuccaRomana_: ^I don't know where your uncle is right now, but I would assume maybe at the bakery. I hope he is doing alright.
DanniRiccobono0PiccolaPanetteria_: ^I don't know what you know about the bakery, but if Lucca is your uncle you should ask him what happened.
DanniRiccobono0TheBees_: ^They aren't too friendly of punks, they probably wont't want to talk to you.
GiovanniRiccobono_: ^I have never met him, but I know the town misses him. From all the stories it seems like he did the best he could, I try not to get wrapped up small town drama.
GiovanniRiccobono0LuccaRomana_: ^I uhh, I don't know much about that whole situation. Ask around I am sure other people know more than I do.
GiovanniRiccobono0PiccolaPanetteria_: ^Yeah, that's a lot to unpack. I would assume he misses the bakery, but I don't know him, you would know more than I do.
GiovanniRiccobono0TheBees_: ^Hahaha I don't think they know each other...
LuccaRomana_: ^Yeah he and I made a deal that I would sell his pasteries at my cafe, but I don't know what's happening now.
LuccaRomana0PiccolaPanetteria_: ^Oh I have heard something is happening with him and the bakery, it seems he is getting too old to run it by himself.
LuccaRomana0TheBees_: ^I don't think those punks like anyone over the age of 16.
PiccolaPanetteria_: ^Oh if you are looking for the bakery you should go to the piazza, you have a map, right? It's just a bit futher into town.
PiccolaPanetteria0TheBees_: ^I have seen those punks loiter everywhere but they know not to mess with the bakery or Lucca il Lupo.
TheBees_: ^Yeah those kids are just a bunch of punks. They are just at that age where they just are annoying.

Default_: ^Hey, newbie. Welcome to The Bees turf. -YEAH we run this place!

DanniRiccobono0GiovanniRiccobono_: ^We don't know anything about your family. We don't care.
DanniRiccobono0LuccaRomana_: ^You are related to that old man? -What? -Yeah never seen you around before.
DanniRiccobono0PiccolaPanetteria_: ^We don't know you but we know the bakery.
DanniRiccobono0TheBees_: ^We don't like chatting with grown up newbies like you.
GiovanniRiccobono_: ^Don't know 'em. -Actually I heard he left town for some girl, I would never leave my brothers behind like that.
GiovanniRiccobono0LuccaRomana_: ^Oh yeah everyone knows about their beef. But we don't care, that's not what we do.
GiovanniRiccobono0PiccolaPanetteria_: ^Don't know much about your granddaddy besides that he left town. -Yeah a bit strange to run away like that, that's what my Dad said.
GiovanniRiccobono0TheBees_: ^Lady, we don't know your gramps. He don't live here anymore.
LuccaRomana_: ^That old geezer runs the bakery in town. -I would kill for a cupcake right now. -Oh I would love an oatmeal rasin cookie -Ew what the heck man?
LuccaRomana0PiccolaPanetteria_: ^He is always nice to us unlike everyone else, he is cool in our book.
